"Murriah": "My apologies. You are truly a saint."
"Now, the heart of the matter is... Are you familiar with Dread Enemies?"
"Yes yes, those dreadful ones with the strange names."
"It would seem even the Retem ARKS are having trouble with them."
"I wanted to lend them my aid. But I am hopeless on my own..."
"So I came to enlist you for help. We can split the work and take them down."
"...What? Why am I sweating? Wh-Why else, we're in a d-desert of course!"
"Now, let's go get those Dread Enemies!"
